title: Ticket #3512: Add a test for starter pre/post scripts
description: We don't have any test for starter pre/post scripts, and we should. It should probably test all of the universes on which starter pre/post scripts should work. Currently they work on vanilla universe; it seems like they should work on local universe, but they don't (see #3511). I don't know if they should work for standard universe.
check_ins: 2013-Feb-26 10:22   Check-in [35012]: Gittrac #3512: added job_starter_script-A test. (By Kent Wenger )
creator: wenger
